#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--) {
		string s;
		cin >> s;
		int d;
		cin >> d;
		int l = s.length();
		int x = l-d+1;
		string ans="";
		string one = "";
		for (int i=0;i<d-1;i++) {
			one += s[i];
		}
		for (int i=d-1;i<l;i++) {
			ans += s[i];
		}
		if(x & 1) {
			reverse(one.begin(),one.end());
			ans += one;
		}
		else {
			ans += one;
		}
		cout << ans << endl;
	}
}
